trans-unit.source: Generates internal mappings to .NET Framework types for XML schema element declarations.
trans-unit.target: 針對 XML 結構描述項目宣告，產生 .NET Framework 類型的內部對應。

trans-unit.source: Expands upon <see cref="T:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtension" /> to provide additional functionality for typed datasets created for .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: 根據 <see cref="T:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtension" /> 展開，為針對 .NET Framework 3.5 版所建立的具類型資料集提供額外的功能。

trans-unit.source: `System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtensionFx35` calls the protected constructor of <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtension> to generate typed datasets for the .NET Framework version 3.5 and enable LINQ to DataSet and hierarchical update.
trans-unit.target: `System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtensionFx35` 呼叫的受保護的建構函式<xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtension>適用於.NET Framework 3.5 版產生具類型資料集，並啟用 LINQ to DataSet 和階層式更新。

trans-unit.source: LINQ to DataSet and hierarchical update are features that were added in [!INCLUDE[vs_orcas_long](~/includes/vs-orcas-long-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: LINQ to DataSet 和階層式更新會在新增功能的[!INCLUDE[vs_orcas_long](~/includes/vs-orcas-long-md.md)]。
另請參閱[階層式更新概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c4f8e8b9-e4a5-4a02-8462-d03d1e8222d6)和[LINQ to DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/linq-to-dataset.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtensionFx35" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtensionFx35" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Expands upon <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtension> to provide additional functionality for typed datasets for .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: 展開時<xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtension>提供型別資料集的其他功能，適用於.NET Framework 3.5 版。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtensionFx35> calls the protected constructor of <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtension> to generate typed datasets for .NET Framework version 3.5 and enable LINQ to DataSet and hierarchical update.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtensionFx35> 呼叫的受保護的建構函式<xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtension>適用於.NET Framework 3.5 版產生具類型資料集，並啟用 LINQ to DataSet 和階層式更新。

trans-unit.source: LINQ to Dataset and hierarchical update are features in [!INCLUDE[vs_orcas_long](~/includes/vs-orcas-long-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: LINQ to Dataset 和階層式更新會在功能[!INCLUDE[vs_orcas_long](~/includes/vs-orcas-long-md.md)]。
請參閱[LINQ to DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/linq-to-dataset.md)和[階層式更新概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c4f8e8b9-e4a5-4a02-8462-d03d1e8222d6)。
